title: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
subtitle: GTA+
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposited directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ members who've signed up for this month (March 7 - April 3) will also receive:

— The Pfister 811 Super car
— Access to the Vinewood Club Garage
— Exclusive clothing
— 2X GTA$ and RP on Freemode Events and Challenges
— 50% off the High-End Apartment Properties
— And more

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
